Text:
It's a lengthy movie, mostly dark scenes. So I had to increase the bitrate, hence the size. 
Kindly adjust, thanks :)

@ Peeps
About the size.... this is the best possible compression for this movie, compressing further results in pixelation and darkness.

Great quality with great size as always..

+1, Thanks SaLH

Very good ...StyLishSaLH

Thanks very much...
